explains: v. 参加，参与；<古>分担，分享；<古>具有，带有（特殊的性质）
wordGroup: participate in social activities 参与社会活动

sentences.en: She didn't participate in the discussion.
They expected him to participate in the ceremony.
sentences.cn: 他们希望他参加这个典礼。

sentences.en: Over half the population of this country participate in sports.
sentences.cn: 这个国家一半以上的人参加体育运动。
